Text:
Can u please confirm there are no EN subs?

thanx!
It has English SDH subtitles for the deaf and hard of hearing. The English subtitles include things like sound effects. I'm trying to add that to the description but Its not updating.
It includes English SDH (subtitles for the deaf and hard of hearing that include sound effects). I'm trying to edit the description but it won't update.
The disc worked beautifully! It is more than awesome!

The supplemental disc was difficult to burn. I coastered 5 Memorex DVD+R DL discs trying Nero 9 and InfraRecorder. Finally got it burned by extracting the ISO with WinRAR then burning with Nero 9 on an older NEC burner. My new Optiarc would crap out partway through, burning the ISO or the extracted files. The movie ISO burned fine on the Optiarc with Nero.

The main movie worked perfectly.  Thanks!

The supplemental disc doesn't seem to have anything valid in it.  I've tried Daemon Tools and a couple of other things and can't get anything to recognize it as valid.  Am I missing something?
Thanx, P4RIAH, for the additional info!
Many thanks for this incredible movie in the best quality yet available - perfect!
And oh, the supplemental disc works just perfect (got rid of everything outside the VIDEO_TS folder though) - the documentary seems very interesting!

Ahh Yes! A torrent with the supplemental disk!

Does this torrent have the commentary working? The last one i downloaded removed the commentary track :\
This is a direct copy of the DVDs. Everything that was on the DVDs is included. Including the commentary tracks.
